xplane_props.py

Defines X-Plane Properties attached to regular Blender data types.

Summary
xplane_props.pyDefines X-Plane Properties attached to regular Blender data types.
XPlaneCustomAttributeA custom attribute.
XPlaneDatarefA X-Plane Dataref
XPlaneDatarefSearchNot used right now.
XPlaneManipulatorA X-Plane manipulator settings
XPlaneCockpitRegionDefines settings for a cockpit region.
XPlaneLODDefines settings for a level of detail.
XPlaneLayerDefines settings for a OBJ file.
XPlaneSceneSettingsSettings for Blender scenes.
XPlaneObjectSettingsSettings for Blender objects.
XPlaneBoneSettingsSettings for Blender bones.
XPlaneMaterialSettingsSettings for Blender materials.
XPlaneLampSettingsSettings for Blender lamps.
Functions
addXPlaneRNARegisters all properties.
removeXPlaneRNAUnregisters all properties.

XPlaneCustomAttribute

A custom attribute.

Properties

string nameName of the attribute
string valueValue of the attribute
string resetReseter of the attribute

XPlaneDataref

A X-Plane Dataref

Properties

string pathDataref path
float valueDataref value (can be keyframed)
int loopLoop amount of dataref animation.

XPlaneDatarefSearch

Not used right now.  Might be used to search for dataref paths. class XPlaneDatarefSearch(bpy.types.PropertyGroup): path = bpy.props.StringProperty(attr=”path”, name=”Dataref path”, description=”XPlane Dataref path”, default = “”)

XPlaneManipulator

A X-Plane manipulator settings

Properties

bool enabledTrue if object is a manipulator
enum typeManipulator types as defined in OBJ specs.
string tooltipManipulator Tooltip
enum cursorManipulator cursors as defined in OBJ specs.
int dxX-Drag axis length
int dyY-Drag axis length
int dzZ-Drag axis length
float v1Value 1
float v2Value 2
float v1_minValue 1 min.
float v1_maxValue 1 max.
float v2_minValue 2 min.
float v2_maxValue 2 max.
float v_downValue on mouse down
float v_upValue on mouse up
float v_holdValue on mouse hold
float v_onOn value
float v_offOff value
string commandCommand
string positive_commandPositive command
string negative_commandNegative command
string dataref1Dataref 1
string dataref2Dataref 2

XPlaneCockpitRegion

Defines settings for a cockpit region.

Properties

int toptop position of the region in px
int leftleft position of the region in px
int widthwidth of the region in powers of 2
int heightheight of the region in powers of 2

XPlaneLOD

Defines settings for a level of detail.

Properties

int nearnear distance
int farfar distance

XPlaneLayer

Defines settings for a OBJ file.  Is “parented” to a Blender layer.

Properties

int indexindex of this layer.
bool expandedTrue if the settings of this layer are expanded in the UI.
string nameName of the OBJ file to export from this layer.
bool cockpitTrue if this layer serves as a cockpit OBJ.
float slungLoadWeightSlung Load weight
string textureTexture file to use for this OBJ.
string texture_litNight Texture to use for this OBJ.
string texture_normalNormal/Specular Texture to use for this OBJ.
customAttributesCollection of XPlaneCustomAttributes.  Custom X-Plane header attributes.

XPlaneSceneSettings

Settings for Blender scenes.

Properties

layersCollection of XPlaneLayers.  Export settings for the Blender layers.

XPlaneObjectSettings

Settings for Blender objects.

Properties

datarefsCollection of XPlaneDatarefs.  X-Plane Datarefs
bool depthTrue if object will use depth culling.
customAttributesCollection of XPlaneCustomAttributes.  Custom X-Plane attributes
bool panelTrue if object is part of the cockpit panel.
XPlaneManipulator manipManipulator settings.
bool lightLevelTrue if object overrides default light levels.
float lightLevel_v1Light Level Value 1
float lightLevel_v2Light Level Value 2
string lightLevel_datarefLight Level Dataref

XPlaneBoneSettings

Settings for Blender bones.

Properties

datarefsCollection of XPlaneDatarefs.  X-Plane Datarefs

XPlaneMaterialSettings

Settings for Blender materials.

Properties

enum surfaceTypeSurface type as defined in OBJ specs.
bool blendTrue if the material uses alpha cutoff.
float blendRatioAlpha cutoff ratio.
customAttributesCollection of XPlaneCustomAttributes.  Custom X-Plane attributes

XPlaneLampSettings

Settings for Blender lamps.

Properties

enum typeLight type as defined in OBJ specs.
string nameLight name, if “type” is ‘named’.
string paramsLight params, if “type” is ‘param’.
float sizeLight size, if “type” is ‘custom’.
string datarefDataref driving the light, if “type” is ‘custom’.
customAttributesCollection of XPlaneCustomAttributes.  Custom X-Plane attributes
Summary
Functions
addXPlaneRNARegisters all properties.
removeXPlaneRNAUnregisters all properties.

Functions

addXPlaneRNA

def addXPlaneRNA()

Registers all properties.

removeXPlaneRNA

def removeXPlaneRNA()

Unregisters all properties.

Registers all properties.
def removeXPlaneRNA()
Unregisters all properties.
